channel.title: Need help with a command
channel.description:
well i have the givehidden command i was wondering how do you make it so like 2 ppl can use the command, cuz currently i made it so only i can give hidden to people but i want my co to be able to also so here is code
[code] } else if (command.startsWith("givehidden") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Bmw")) {[/code]
would it be [code] } else if (command.startsWith("givehidden") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Bmw || bambam")) {[/code] cuz i tried that but it didnt work can someone help plz

repped

item.title: Need help with a command
item.dc:creator: @iamapker iamapker
item.description:
@iamapker wrote:

I Vain I:

&& playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Bmw") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("BamBam"))

lol i knew it was something like that stupid brain, thanks man lol thank you very much

Read full topic
